Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A. 518/S. 4860, to require dating violence education and dating violence policies in schools.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require dating violence education and dating violence policies in schools.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to require that all public school students receive age-differentiated anti-bullying instruction and complete an anti-bullying course focused especially on cyberbullying.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require that all public school students receive age-differentiated anti-bullying instruction and complete an anti-bullying course focused especially on cyberbullying.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Education to bring more mentoring programs into schools to combat bullying and violence, as called for in the Stop School Violence online petition campaign by Anthony Vargas, a local high school student.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE to bring more mentoring programs into schools to combat bullying and violence, as called for in the Stop School Violence online petition campaign by Anthony Vargas, a local high school student.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York City Department of Education to establish an awareness and prevention program in the public schools athletic league to combat intimate partner abuse.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: DOE establish an awareness and prevention program in the public schools athletic league to combat intimate partner abuse.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to mandate that the New York State Education Department include intimate partner abuse awareness and prevention programs in all public middle school and high school athletic programs.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Mandate that the NYS Education Dept include intimate partner abuse awareness and prevention programs in all public middle school and high school athletic programs.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign A. 518/S. 4860, to require dating violence education and dating violence policies in schools.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require dating violence education and dating violence policies in schools.
